intro.title: Welcome to Favour Kelvin's Portfolio
intro.description: Hello! I'm Favour Kelvin, a Technical Writer with a strong background in Software Engineering. My journey began as a software developer, where I discovered my passion for open-source projects. I've participated in Google Open Source programs such as Google Summer of Code, Google Code-In, and Google Season of Docs. I love sharing knowledge and helping others excel through technical articles, documentation, and community events.

writing-sample/blogs.title: Blogs and Articles Writing Sample
writing-sample/blogs.description: Welcome to my Blogs and Articles writing sample section! As a technical writer, I enjoy creating engaging and informative blog posts and articles on a wide range of topics. Below are some examples of my work in this domain:

writing-sample/newsletter.title: Welcome to my Newsletter Writing Portfolio
writing-sample/newsletter.description: Welcome to my Newsletter Writing portfolio section! As a technical writer with a knack for effective communication, I specialize in crafting engaging and informative newsletters that captivate your audience. Below is an example of my work in this category:

writing-sample/tutorial.title: Documentation Samples
writing-sample/tutorial.description: I have prepared a collection of writing samples to showcase my expertise in user guides and tutorials. These samples highlight my ability to create clear, comprehensive, and user-friendly documentation.
